name: Cooking Star: Idle Pocket Chef
description:
Cooking Star is a highly addictive time management kitchen game, in which you are the chef running a fast- paced restaurant.

Cook, serve and make money with simple actions!
- Tap to select ingredients, prepare food, and serve your hungry customers.
- Level up to collect golden keys and make a fortune.
- Build your own popular restaurant chain and follow a piquant story!

Cook various food settings.
- 100+ ingredients to whip into gourmet meals.
- New restaurant accompanied by new dishes.
- Expand your cooking empire all over the world!

Open new restaurants, play anytime & anywhere!
- Test your culinary skills on mobile devices.
- Stunning offline or online time- management game play.
- Show you a pretty immersive experience!

Master massive kitchen tools, test your kitchen skills!
- Upscale restaurant cuisine brings higher income.
- Sharpen time- management skills with better kitchen appliances!
- Cook tasty steak, savory hot dogs and mouth- watering burgers
- Spin the lucky wheel to earn big tips!

200+ Levels with unique goals to challenge!
- Complete missions and achievements with fantastic boosts!
- New York, London, Rome & more - restaurants around the world waiting for you to unlock.
- Endless fun with fabulous dishes constantly updated!
- Manage top cooking restaurants with your sharp mind and quick fingers.

Download Cooking Star for free. Enjoy the fun with cooking!

Time Management cooking game for everyone to enjoy!
